ch0090_40_daigo/0101_0701_02_10:
Summer is an exciting time, isn’t it? I hope you
enjoy each and every one of your adventures
to the fullest!
ch0090_40_daigo/0601_0701_01_10: This outfit looks nice and cool, doesn’t it?
ch0090_40_daigo/0601_0701_02_10:
We’re going to a festival, after all. I would look
out of place in my regular suit.
ch0090_40_daigo/0601_0701_03_10:
However, this new look of mine might explain why
I suddenly find myself surrounded by people.
ch0090_40_daigo/0601_0701_04_10:
Or maybe it’s because I’m so well known
in Hoenn?
ch0090_40_daigo/0602_0701_01_10:
Pasio is an artificial island that was created
for the PML.
ch0090_40_daigo/0602_0701_02_10:
What sort of energy system is in place that’s
capable of providing power to an artificial island
of this scale?
ch0090_40_daigo/0602_0701_03_10:
I’d love to know more about the technology
being utilized here.
ch0090_40_daigo/0603_0701_01_10:
Have you heard of Groudon? It’s a Legendary
Pokémon native to Hoenn.
ch0090_40_daigo/0603_0701_02_10:
Groudon is said to have called up harsh sunlight
that dried up the ocean, expanding the continents.
ch0090_40_daigo/0603_0701_03_10: Well, the summer sun isn’t as dangerous as that.
ch0090_40_daigo/0603_0701_04_10:
It’s just that I’m always reminded of that story
on hot days like today.
ch0090_40_daigo/0604_0701_01_10:
I’m not very good at cutting loose and having
a good time.
ch0090_40_daigo/0604_0701_02_10:
It’s great to see Pasio so caught up in such a
festive atmosphere, but I just don’t know how
to enjoy it...
ch0090_40_daigo/0604_0701_03_10:
I know! If you see any booths that have geological
finds on display, could you let me know?
ch0090_40_daigo/0604_0701_04_10:
You’d be surprised what rare stones you can
sometimes find at places like this!
ch0090_40_daigo/0605_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! If you’re going out to
do fieldwork, be especially mindful of the heat.
ch0090_40_daigo/0605_0701_02_10:
Some Pokémon perk up in strong sunlight, but be
careful not to get too much sun yourself.
ch0090_40_daigo/0605_0701_03_10:
You’ll be safe if you’re going into caves to search
for rare stones...
ch0090_40_daigo/0605_0701_04_10:
but if you’re outside and you think you may be
getting too much sun, be sure to get under some
shade right away.
ch0090_40_daigo/1701_0701_01_10: Excellent timing! I have something for you.
ch0090_40_daigo/1701_0701_02_10: I hope you’ll accept it. It’s perfect for you.
ch0090_40_daigo/1701_0702_01_10:
In fact, it’s one of my top five favorite items of
all time!
ch0090_40_daigo/1701_0702_02_10: What? Was that too over the top?
ch0090_40_daigo/2501_0701_01_10:
Our bonds with our partner Pokémon can grow
stronger even outside of battles.
ch0090_40_daigo/2501_0701_02_10:
In other words, we can create new bonds by
enjoying summer to the fullest with our Pokémon.
ch0090_40_daigo/2501_0701_03_10:
The same goes for relationships between Trainers.
Summer can create new bonds there as well.
ch0090_40_daigo/2501_0701_04_10:
Spending time together is a valuable experience
that’s worth every moment.
ch0090_40_daigo/2501_0702_01_10:
What do you think of the bonds you’ve made
this summer?
ch0090_40_daigo/2501_0702_02_10: Do you think they’ll last a lifetime?
ch0090_40_daigo/2511_0701_01_10: Do you know what a meteor shower is?
ch0090_40_daigo/2511_0701_02_10:
It’s when numerous shooting stars can be seen
soaring through the sky. Some even fall to this
planet as meteorites.
ch0090_40_daigo/2511_0701_03_10:
The Hoenn region has a long history of shooting
stars and meteorites.
ch0090_40_daigo/2511_0701_04_10:
Special stones raining down from the skies...
I can’t help but feel a sense of adventure there.
ch0090_40_daigo/2511_0702_01_10:
I wonder if we can also observe meteor showers
here on Pasio.
ch0090_40_daigo/2511_0702_02_10:
Would you like to watch a meteor shower with
me? How does that sound?
ch0090_40_daigo/3001_0701_01_10:
Days like this make me want to go snorkeling
with my Pokémon. Care to join us?
ch0090_40_daigo/3003_0701_01_10:
Would you rather cool off with an Ice Stone or
an Icy Rock? I wonder which one would
work better.
ch0090_40_daigo/3005_0701_01_10:
It doesn’t matter if it gets dark or cold outside—
it always feels like summertime somewhere
on Pasio.
